title: Family Member Functionality - Comprehensive End-to-End Test Report

results.details: Modal opens → Form fills → Submit → Immediate display → Expected: New member appears in GroupedFamilyView without refresh
Click edit → Modify data → Auto-save → Persist → Expected: Changes save automatically and display immediately
Add/Edit member → Refresh page → Data persists → Expected: All changes survive page refresh

canAddFamilyMembersImmediately.description: User can add family members and see them immediately without page refresh
canAddFamilyMembersImmediately.testProcedure: Navigate to Family Profile → Click Add Family Member → Fill form → Submit → Verify immediate appearance

canEditInlineWithoutNavigation.description: User can edit family members inline without full-screen navigation
canEditInlineWithoutNavigation.testProcedure: Click edit on family member → Make changes → Save → Verify inline editing and immediate updates

changesPersistAfterRefresh.testProcedure: Make changes → Refresh page → Verify data persistence

noConsoleErrorsOrBrokenFunctionality.description: No console errors or broken functionality
noConsoleErrorsOrBrokenFunctionality.testProcedure: Monitor browser console during all operations → Verify no JavaScript errors

recommendations: Complete manual testing checklist to verify user interaction flows
Test with multiple family members to verify scalability
Verify mobile responsiveness on actual devices
